data.title: South Australian births, deaths and marriages before civil registration
data.meta_description: Information and the names of the persons born, marrying or dying in South Australia before June 1842.
data.text:
Civil registration began in South Australia on 1 June 1842 and that means we have a mere six years of European settlement outside civil registration.

Name Search:

The following searchable database will disclose the known persons recorded in the above records. The version contained herein has been updated to 20 Dec 2005.

Click on and find out how to improve your search results!

To find more information about the event you need to visit an appropriate library and access the CDs compiled by Graham Jaunay.
